CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-21 14:14
Subject: World Cultural Diversity Day, Day 3 Sustainability week, Culture Bootcamp, Well Being Offers, Weekly Internal Opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1058&user=10620> 	

We all carry parts of the cultures we've grown up in, lived in, or been shaped by. They're not always visible, but they show up in how we speak, connect, celebrate, and in the new perspectives we embrace.  

This World Cultural Diversity Day, we’re reflecting on the cultures we carry with us, not as fixed labels, but as living influences that evolve as we move, grow, and meet others.

chunks.text:
We all carry parts of the cultures we've grown up in, lived in, or been shaped by. They're not always visible, but they show up in how we speak, connect, celebrate, and in the new perspectives we embrace.  

This World Cultural Diversity Day, we’re reflecting on the cultures we carry with us, not as fixed labels, but as living influences that evolve as we move, grow, and meet others.  

What parts of your culture do you still carry with you today?
Join the conversation here.  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1058&user=10620>   <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1058&user=10620> 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1058&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/99104042a1eae6bf548a19824ff30eb8599205587.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/9c0bdcbf45b89a8ccdd0867df2e6519d1294062490.png> 	

Day 2 of Sustainability Week!

Small actions. Big impact!

Today, let’s challenge ourselves to think greener, act smarter, and inspire others along the way.

chunks.text:
Today, let’s challenge ourselves to think greener, act smarter, and inspire others along the way.


Dial in <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1059&user=10620>  tomorrow for a special webinar on Circular Fashion as we introduce reMUSE.
Check out other workshops in your respective countries.
UAE <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1060&user=10620>  | KSA <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1061&user=10620>  | Bahrain <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1062&user=10620>  | Egypt <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1063&user=10620>  | Jordan <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1064&user=10620>  | India <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1065&user=10620>  | Kuwait <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1066&user=10620>  | Qatar <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1067&user=10620>

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/99104042a1eae6bf548a19824ff30eb8599205587.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Last week’s Culture Bootcamp!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1068&user=10620> 	

Last week, our UAE team members had the opportunity to bring our "One Team, One Culture" spirit to life. During this Culture Bootcamp, everyone engaged deeply with the Group culture, gaining insights into diverse approaches and mindsets that contribute to our ongoing cultural evolution journey.

Want to be part of the next one? Join us for the upcoming session on 3 July in D3. Click here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1068&user=10620>  to sign up.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

New Wellbeing Offers & Discounts!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1069&user=10620> 	

Discover the new wellbeing benefits now available to you, including options for meal plans, nurseries, wellness centers, and more.

Check out all offers here! <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1069&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-2-min.png> 	

WEEKLY INTERNAL OPPORTUNITIES
